# Government Tender Announcement: CCGS Griffon Alongside Refit 2023
**Project Title:** CCGS Griffon Alongside Refit 2023
**Solicitation Number:** F2599-230001/A

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
**Trade Agreement:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

We are seeking a qualified contractor to perform the alongside refit of the Canadian Coast Guard Ship (CCGS) Griffon. The refit includes inspection, repair, and maintenance of the vessel, as well as alterations to meet regulatory requirements and certifications.

**Project Period:**
The work will take place from June 7th, 2023 to August 30th, 2023.
**Location:** Canadian Coast Guard Base Prescott, 401 King Street West, Prescott, Ontario K0E 1T0.

**Scope of Work:**
The selected contractor will be responsible for carrying out the following tasks:

* Inspection, repair, and maintenance of the vessel
* Alterations to meet regulatory requirements and certifications
* Work items may include:
	+ Bilge cleaning
	+ Annual fire system inspection
	+ Propulsion generators, motors, and overcurrent protection
	+ Propulsion control system
	+ Motor blowers
	+ Generator and motor coolers
	+ Annual Megger testing
	+ AC circuit breakers
	+ Refrigeration cooling water discharge piping
	+ Stores crane inspection
	+ Main crane load monitoring system

**Bidder’s Conference and Site Visit:**
A bidders' conference call will be held on Monday, April 17th, 2023 at 9AM EST to review the scope of work and answer questions.
A site visit will be held on April 13th, 2023 from 9 am to 5 pm EST at the Canadian Coast Guard Base Prescott.

**Submission Requirements:**
Interested suppliers must submit their proposals in either English or French.
Please note that the Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Contact Information:**
Mark Hatherall
Email: mark.hatherall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Phone: (343) 540-9460

Please refer to the attached documents for detailed project information and requirements. The submission deadline is May 17th, 2023 at 2PM EST. [1](#_ftn1)
